channel.title: VPS help?
channel.description: So I bought a VPS with windows server 2003. I got everything up and running, port 43594 is open, got no-ip, my source on it and runs fine. But when the first person tries to connect after I start running the server, they'll log in, see the gameframe, but everything else will be black, and then get the "connection lost - attempting to re-establish" thing. After that, I lose internet connection on the VPS. I can't even browse the internet, BUT I'll have the little connection icon on the bottom right say I'm still connected. I have the firewall disabled if that makes any difference. Any suggestions? :s

item.title: VPS help?
item.dc:creator: @mc_wobbla mc wobbla
item.description:
@mc_wobbla wrote:

So I bought a VPS with windows server 2003. I got everything up and running, port 43594 is open, got no-ip, my source on it and runs fine. But when the first person tries to connect after I start running the server, they’ll log in, see the gameframe, but everything else will be black, and then get the “connection lost - attempting to re-establish” thing. After that, I lose internet connection on the VPS. I can’t even browse the internet, BUT I’ll have the little connection icon on the bottom right say I’m still connected. I have the firewall disabled if that makes any difference. Any suggestions? :s
